Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 12 Sekkhattika » 12.7 Pañhāvāra » 12.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 12.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Vipāka
Sekkhattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Vipāka
62.
1824Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—  vipāko sekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ…pe… . (Sekkhamūlake tīṇi.)
1825Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—  asekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ…pe… . (Asekkhamūlake tīṇi.)
1826Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—  vipāko nevasekkhanāsekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  khandhā vatthussa vipākapaccayena paccayo. (1)
